blocks.name: gsumval3a
blocks.content: Value of the group sum operation over an index set with finite support. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Dec-2014.) (Revised by AV, 29-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumval3a(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {

  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0))

  -| wceq(c2, co(c1, csupp, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c7, crn(cfz))))

  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c7)

} = {

thm gsumval3a(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum]c1)= iota(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,((s1 :(1[...](# ` c2))‚Üî c2)‚àß s0 =(seq(1(c3,(c1 ‚àò s1)))`(# ` c2))))))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(+ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(Cntz ` c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Mnd)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c7 ‚àà c8)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c1 : c7 ‚Üí c4))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ran(c1)‚äÜ(c6 ` ran(c1)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà Fin)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(c1[supp]c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ¬¨ c7 ‚àà ran(...))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c7)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)

} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum]c1)= iota(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,((s1 :(1[...](# ` c2))‚Üî c2)‚àß s0 =(seq(1(c3,(c1 ‚àò s1)))`(# ` c2)))))), c6 =(Cntz ` c0))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum]c1)= iota(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,((s1 :(1[...](# ` c2))‚Üî c2)‚àß s0 =(seq(1(c3,(c1 ‚àò s1)))`(# ` c2)))))), (w0 ‚Üí ran(c1)‚äÜ(c6 ` ran(c1))))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum]c1)= iota(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,((s1 :(1[...](# ` c2))‚Üî c2)‚àß s0 =(seq(1(c3,(c1 ‚àò s1)))`(# ` c2)))))), (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà Fin))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum]c1)= iota(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,((s1 :(1[...](# ` c2))‚Üî c2)‚àß s0 =(seq(1(c3,(c1 ‚àò s1)))`(# ` c2)))))), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum]c1)= iota(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,((s1 :(1[...](# ` c2))‚Üî c2)‚àß s0 =(seq(1(c3,(c1 ‚àò s1)))`(# ` c2)))))), d(s0, c5))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum]c1)= iota(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,((s1 :(1[...](# ` c2))‚Üî c2)‚àß s0 =(seq(1(c3,(c1 ‚àò s1)))`(# ` c2)))))), d(s0, c7))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum]c1)= iota(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,((s1 :(1[...](# ` c2))‚Üî c2)‚àß s0 =(seq(1(c3,(c1 ‚àò s1)))`(# ` c2)))))), d(s0, c8))

blocks.name: gsumval3eu
blocks.content: The group sum as defined in ~ gsumval3a is uniquely defined. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Dec-2014.)

blocks.name: gsumval3
blocks.content: Value of the group sum operation over an arbitrary finite set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2014.) (Revised by AV, 31-May-2019.)

blocks.name: gsumcllem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ gsumcl and related theorems. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 31-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumcllem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wceq(c0, emptycls)), wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c2, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wss(co(c1, csupp, c3), c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(c1, cmpt(s0, c2, c3), cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wceq(c0, emptycls)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))
  feqmptd(s0, c1, c2, c4, w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c2, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c3, wa(w0, wceq(c0, emptycls)))
  anassrs(w0, wceq(c0, emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c3))
  sylan2(w0, wa(wceq(c0, emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c3), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c2, c0)))
  biimpar(wceq(c0, emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c2, c0)))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), cdif(c2, c0), c2, wceq(c0, emptycls))
  syl6eq(cdif(c2, c0), c2, cdif(c2, emptycls), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  difeq2(c0, emptycls, c2)
  dif0(c2)
  suppssr(cv(s0), c2, c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wceq(c0, emptycls))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

} = {

  biimpar(c0 = ‚àÖ, s0 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚àà(c2 \ c0))
  eleq2d(s0, (c2 \ c0), c2, c0 = ‚àÖ)

blocks.name: gsumzcl2
blocks.content: Closure of a finite group sum. This theorem has a weaker hypothesis than ~ gsumzcl , because it is not required that ` F ` is a function (actually, the hypothesis always holds for any proper class ` F ` ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 1-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:

thm gsumzcl2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum]c1)‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Cntz ` c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Mnd)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c1 : c5 ‚Üí c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ran(c1)‚äÜ(c4 ` ran(c1)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c1[supp]c3)‚àà Fin)
} = {
  mpjaod(w0, (c0[gsum]c1)‚àà c2, (c1[supp]c3)= ‚àÖ, ((# `(c1[supp]c3))‚àà ‚Ñï ‚àß ‚àÉ(hs0,(hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))‚Üî(c1[supp]c3)))))
  ex(w0, (c1[supp]c3)= ‚àÖ, (c0[gsum]c1)‚àà c2)
  eqeltrd((c0[gsum]c1), c2, c3, (w0 ‚àß(c1[supp]c3)= ‚àÖ))
  eqtrd((c0[gsum]c1), c3, (c0[gsum](hs1 ‚àà c5 ‚Ü¶ c3)), (w0 ‚àß(c1[supp]c3)= ‚àÖ))
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, c1, (hs1 ‚àà c5 ‚Ü¶ c3), (w0 ‚àß(c1[supp]c3)= ‚àÖ))
  gsumcllem(hs1, (c1[supp]c3), c1, c5, c3, c2, c6, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvexi(c3, c0g, c0)
  ssidd((c1[supp]c3), w0)
  adantr(w0, (c1[supp]c3)= ‚àÖ, (c0[gsum](hs1 ‚àà c5 ‚Ü¶ c3))= c3)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[gsum](hs1 ‚àà c5 ‚Ü¶ c3))= c3, c0 ‚àà Mnd, c5 ‚àà c6)
  gsumz(hs1, c0, c5, c6, c3)
  adantr(w0, (c1[supp]c3)= ‚àÖ, c3 ‚àà c2)
  syl(w0, c3 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà Mnd)

blocks.name: gsumzcl
blocks.content: Closure of a finite group sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 1-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumzcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ccntz, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c5, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wss(crn(c1), cfv(c4, crn(c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cfsupp, c3))
} = {
  gsumzcl2(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  fsuppimpd(c1, c3, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsumzcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum]c1)‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Cntz ` c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Mnd)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c1 : c5 ‚Üí c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ran(c1)‚äÜ(c4 ` ran(c1)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1[finSupp]c3)
} = {
  gsumzcl2(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  fsuppimpd(c1, c3, w0)
}

blocks.name: gsumres
blocks.content: Extend a finite group sum by padding outside with zeroes. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 3-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumres(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cres(c1, c2)), co(c0, cgsu, c1)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c5, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wss(co(c1, csupp, c4), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cfsupp, c4))
} = {
  gsumzres(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(ccntz, c0), c5, c6, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, ccmn))
  cmnmnd(c0)
  cntzcmnf(c1, cfv(ccntz, c0), c3, c0, c5, w0)
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsumres(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum](c1 |` c2))=(c0[gsum]c1))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà CMnd)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c1 : c5 ‚Üí c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c1[supp]c4)‚äÜ c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1[finSupp]c4)
} = {
  gsumzres(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, (Cntz ` c0), c5, c6, w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ‚àà Mnd, c0 ‚àà CMnd)
  cmnmnd(c0)
  cntzcmnf(c1, (Cntz ` c0), c3, c0, c5, w0)
  eqid((Cntz ` c0))
}

blocks.name: gsumcl2
blocks.content: Closure of a finite group sum. This theorem has a weaker hypothesis than ~ gsumcl , because it is not required that ` F ` is a function (actually, the hypothesis always holds for any proper class ` F ` ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 3-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumcl2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c4, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(co(c1, csupp, c3), cfn))
} = {
  gsumzcl2(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(ccntz, c0), c4, c5, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, ccmn))
  cmnmnd(c0)
  cntzcmnf(c1, cfv(ccntz, c0), c2, c0, c4, w0)
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, c0))
}

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c1[supp]c3)‚àà Fin)
} = {
  gsumzcl2(c0, c1, c2, c3, (Cntz ` c0), c4, c5, w0)

  cmnmnd(c0)

blocks.name: gsumf1o
blocks.content: Re-index a finite group sum using a bijection. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 3-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumf1o(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cgsu, ccom(c1, c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c5, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cfsupp, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wf1o(c2, c7, c5))
} = {
  gsumzf1o(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(ccntz, c0), c5, c6, c7, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, ccmn))
  cmnmnd(c0)
  cntzcmnf(c1, cfv(ccntz, c0), c3, c0, c5, w0)
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, c0))
}

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum]c1)=(c0[gsum](c1 ‚àò c2)))

blocks.name: gsumzsubmcl
blocks.content: Closure of a group sum in a submonoid. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 3-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumzsubmcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ccntz, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c5, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wss(crn(c1), cfv(c4, crn(c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cfsupp, c3))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2)), wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd)))
  3eltr4d(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2, co(co(c0, cress, c2), cgsu, c1), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c2)), w0)
  gsumzcl(co(c0, cress, c2), c1, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c2)), cfv(c0g, co(c0, cress, c2)), cfv(ccntz, co(c0, cress, c2)), c5, c6, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c2)))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, co(c0, cress, c2)))
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c0, cress, c2), cmnd), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c0)))
  submmnd(c2, c0, co(c0, cress, c2))
  mpbid(w0, wf(c1, c5, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c2))), wf(c1, c5, c2))
  feq3d(c1, c5, c2, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c2)), w0)
  sseqtr4d(crn(c1), cfv(cfv(ccntz, co(c0, cress, c2)), crn(c1)), cin(cfv(c4, crn(c1)), c2), w0)
  ssind(crn(c1), cfv(c4, crn(c1)), c2, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(cfv(ccntz, co(c0, cress, c2)), crn(c1)), cin(cfv(c4, crn(c1)), c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c0)), wss(crn(c1), c2))
  frnd(c1, c2, c5, w0)
  resscntz(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c0), crn(c1), cfv(ccntz, co(c0, cress, c2)), c4, co(c0, cress, c2), c0)
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, co(c0, cress, c2)))
  breqtrd(c1, cfsupp, cfv(c0g, co(c0, cress, c2)), c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, co(c0, cress, c2))), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c0)))
  subm0(c2, c0, c3, co(c0, cress, c2))
  gsumsubm(c0, c1, co(c0, cress, c2), c5, c6, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c2))), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c0)))
  submbas(c2, c0, co(c0, cress, c2))
  eqid(co(c0, cress, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsumzsubmcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum]c1)‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Cntz ` c0)

thm gsumadd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, co(c1, cof(c2), c3)), co(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2, co(c0, cgsu, c3))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c6, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c3, c6, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cfsupp, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c3, cfsupp, c5))
} = {
  gsumzadd(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, cfv(ccntz, c0), c6, c7, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(csubmnd, c0)), wcel(c0, cmnd))

  cmnmnd(c0)

  ssid(c4)
  cntzcmn(c0, c4, c4, cfv(ccntz, c0))
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, c0))
}

} = {
  syl5eq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), co(cfv(chash, c1), c4, c2), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs0, c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c2, c3)))
  oveq2i(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cmpt(hs0, c1, c2))

}

  diff.hs3.w(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cfv(chash, cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(universe, csn(c8)))), cn), wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(universe, csn(c8))))), cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(universe, csn(c8)))))))
  diff.hs2.c(ccom(c1, c2))
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(c0g, c0))
  diff.hs2.c(cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(universe, csn(c8))))
  diff.hs0.c(cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(universe, csn(c8))))
}

blocks.name: gsummhm
blocks.content: Apply a group homomorphism to a group sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 6-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsummhm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, ccom(c1, c2)), cfv(c1, co(c3, cgsu, c2))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c3, cmhm, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, c6, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cfsupp, c5))
} = {
  gsumzmhm(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(ccntz, c3), c6, c7, c5, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, cmnd), wcel(c3, ccmn))
  cmnmnd(c3)
  cntzcmnf(c2, cfv(ccntz, c3), c4, c3, c6, w0)
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsummhm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum](c1 ‚àò c2))=(c1 `(c3[gsum]c2)))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(0 ` c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà CMnd)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Mnd)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c6 ‚àà c7)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(c3[MndHom]c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c2 : c6 ‚Üí c4))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2[finSupp]c5)
} = {
  gsumzmhm(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, (Cntz ` c3), c6, c7, c5, w0)
  syl(w0, c3 ‚àà Mnd, c3 ‚àà CMnd)
  cmnmnd(c3)
  cntzcmnf(c2, (Cntz ` c3), c4, c3, c6, w0)
  eqid((Cntz ` c3))
}

blocks.name: gsummhm2
blocks.content: Apply a group homomorphism to a group sum, mapping version with implicit substitution. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2015.) (Revised by AV, 6-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsummhm2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s1, c4, c8), co(c5, cmhm, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c9, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c1, c9), cfsupp, c6))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c9), wceq(c8, c2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), co(c5, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c9))), wceq(c8, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c9)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr3d(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cgsu, ccom(cmpt(s1, c4, c8), cmpt(s0, c1, c9))), cfv(cmpt(s1, c4, c8), co(c5, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c9))), w0)
  gsummhm(c0, cmpt(s1, c4, c8), cmpt(s0, c1, c9), c5, c4, c6, c1, c7, w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, ccom(cmpt(s1, c4, c8), cmpt(s0, c1, c9)), cmpt(s0, c1, c2), w0)
  fmptco(s0, s1, cmpt(s1, c4, c8), cmpt(s0, c1, c9), c1, c2, c9, c4, c8, w0)
  eqidd(cmpt(s0, c1, c9), w0)
  eqidd(cmpt(s1, c4, c8), w0)
  fvmptd3(s1, cmpt(s1, c4, c8), co(c5, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c9)), c3, c4, c8, cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  rspcdva(s1, co(c5, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c9)), c4, w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c8, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  eleq1d(c8, cfv(cbs, c0), c3, wceq(cv(s1), co(c5, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c9))))
  sylibr(w0, wral(s1, c4, wcel(c8, cfv(cbs, c0))), wf(cmpt(s1, c4, c8), c4, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  syl(w0, wf(cmpt(s1, c4, c8), c4, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s1, c4, c8), co(c5, cmhm, c0)))
  mhmf(cmpt(s1, c4, c8), c5, c0, c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  fmpt(s1, c4, c8, cfv(cbs, c0), cmpt(s1, c4, c8))
  eqid(cmpt(s1, c4, c8))
  gsumcl(c5, cmpt(s0, c1, c9), c4, c6, c1, c7, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c1, c9, c4, w0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c5, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c9))
  diff.cgsu.s(s1)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, c1, c9)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cbs, c0)
  diff.cbs.s(s1)
}

thm gsummhm2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum](s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2))= c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(0 ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà CMnd)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Mnd)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c7)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(s1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c8)‚àà(c5[MndHom]c0))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí c9 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c9)[finSupp]c6)
  ‚ä£ (s1 = c9 ‚Üí c8 = c2)
  ‚ä£ (s1 =(c5[gsum](s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c9))‚Üí c8 = c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c8)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c9)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr3d((c0[gsum](s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)), c3, (c0[gsum]((s1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c8)‚àò(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c9))), ((s1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c8)`(c5[gsum](s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c9))), w0)
  gsummhm(c0, (s1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c8), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c9), c5, c4, c6, c1, c7, w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, ((s1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c8)‚àò(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c9)), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2), w0)
  fmptco(s0, s1, (s1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c8), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c9), c1, c2, c9, c4, c8, w0)
  eqidd((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c9), w0)
  eqidd((s1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c8), w0)
  fvmptd3(s1, (s1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c8), (c5[gsum](s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c9)), c3, c4, c8, (Base ` c0), w0)
  rspcdva(s1, (c5[gsum](s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c9)), c4, w0, c3 ‚àà(Base ` c0), c8 ‚àà(Base ` c0))
  eleq1d(c8, (Base ` c0), c3, s1 =(c5[gsum](s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c9)))
  sylibr(w0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c4, c8 ‚àà(Base ` c0)), ((s1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c8): c4 ‚Üí(Base ` c0)))
  syl(w0, ((s1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c8): c4 ‚Üí(Base ` c0)), (s1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c8)‚àà(c5[MndHom]c0))
  mhmf((s1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c8), c5, c0, c4, (Base ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  fmpt(s1, c4, c8, (Base ` c0), (s1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c8))
  eqid((s1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c8))
  gsumcl(c5, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c9), c4, c6, c1, c7, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c1, c9, c4, w0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c5, cgsu, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c9))
  diff.cgsu.s(s1)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, c1, c9)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c3, (Base ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cbs, c0)
  diff.cbs.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: gsummptmhm
blocks.content: Apply a group homomorphism to a group sum expressed with a mapping. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Sep-2018.) (Revised by AV, 8-Sep-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsummptmhm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c2, c3))), cfv(c2, co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c3)))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(c4, cmhm, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c1, c3), cfsupp, c6))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtr3d(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c2, c3))), cfv(c2, co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c3))), co(c0, cgsu, ccom(c2, cmpt(s0, c1, c3))), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, ccom(c2, cmpt(s0, c1, c3)), cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), w0)
  fmptco(s0, hs0, c2, cmpt(s0, c1, c3), c1, cfv(c2, c3), c3, c5, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), w0)
  eqidd(cmpt(s0, c1, c3), w0)
  sylib(w0, wceq(c2, cmpt(hs0, c5, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), wfn(c2, c5))
  3syl(w0, wfn(c2, c5), wcel(c2, co(c4, cmhm, c0)), wf(c2, c5, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  mhmf(c2, c4, c0, c5, cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  ffn(c2, c5, cfv(cbs, c0))
  dffn5(hs0, c2, c5)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c3, c2)
  gsummhm(c0, c2, cmpt(s0, c1, c3), c4, c5, c6, c1, c7, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c1, c3, c5, w0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c2, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

thm gsummptmhm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum](s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(c2 ` c3)))=(c2 `(c4[gsum](s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c3))))
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Base ` c4)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c7)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(c4[MndHom]c0))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí c3 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c3)[finSupp]c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)

} = {
  eqtr3d((c0[gsum](s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(c2 ` c3))), (c2 `(c4[gsum](s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c3))), (c0[gsum](c2 ‚àò(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c3))), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, (c2 ‚àò(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c3)), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(c2 ` c3)), w0)
  fmptco(s0, hs0, c2, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c3), c1, (c2 ` c3), c3, c5, (c2 ` hs0), w0)
  eqidd((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c3), w0)
  sylib(w0, c2 =(hs0 ‚àà c5 ‚Ü¶(c2 ` hs0)), c2[Fn]c5)
  3syl(w0, c2[Fn]c5, c2 ‚àà(c4[MndHom]c0), (c2 : c5 ‚Üí(Base ` c0)))
  mhmf(c2, c4, c0, c5, (Base ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  ffn(c2, c5, (Base ` c0))
  dffn5(hs0, c2, c5)
  fveq2(hs0, c3, c2)
  gsummhm(c0, c2, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c3), c4, c5, c6, c1, c7, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c1, c3, c5, w0)

}

blocks.name: gsummulglem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ gsummulg and ~ gsummulgz . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2015.) (Revised by AV, 6-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsummulglem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, co(c2, c3, c4))), co(c2, c3, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c4)))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmg, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c7))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c1, c4), cfsupp, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wo(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  gsummhm2(s0, hs0, c0, c1, co(c2, c3, c4), co(c2, c3, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c4))), c5, c0, c6, c7, co(c2, c3, cv(hs0)), c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, ccmn))
  cmnmnd(c0)
  mpjaod(w0, wcel(cmpt(hs0, c5, co(c2, c3, cv(hs0))), co(c0, cmhm, c0)), wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c2, cn0))
  syl(w0, wi(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(cmpt(hs0, c5, co(c2, c3, cv(hs0))), co(c0, cmhm, c0))), wcel(c2, cz))
  expcom(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(cmpt(hs0, c5, co(c2, c3, cv(hs0))), co(c0, cmhm, c0)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(cmpt(hs0, c5, co(c2, c3, cv(hs0))), co(c0, cmhm, c0)), wcel(cmpt(hs0, c5, co(c2, c3, cv(hs0))), co(c0, cghm, c0)))
  mulgghm(hs0, c0, c2, c5, c3)
  ghmmhm(cmpt(hs0, c5, co(c2, c3, cv(hs0))), c0, c0)
  syl(w0, wi(wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(cmpt(hs0, c5, co(c2, c3, cv(hs0))), co(c0, cmhm, c0))), wcel(c0, ccmn))
  ex(wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(cmpt(hs0, c5, co(c2, c3, cv(hs0))), co(c0, cmhm, c0)))
  mulgmhm(hs0, c0, c2, c5, c3)
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c4, c2, c3)
  oveq2(cv(hs0), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c4)), c2, c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, c3, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, c3, c4))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, c3, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c4))))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

thm gsummulglem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum](s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(c2[c3]c4)))=(c2[c3](c0[gsum](s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c4))))
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(.g ` c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c7)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí c4 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c4)[finSupp]c6)

blocks.name: gsumzinv
blocks.content: Inverse of a group sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 6-Jun-2019.)

} = {
  eqtr3d(co(c0, cgsu, ccom(c1, c2)), cfv(c1, co(c0, cgsu, c2)), co(cfv(coppg, c0), cgsu, ccom(c1, c2)), w0)

  a1i(w0, wcel(c4, universe))

thm gsumsnfd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

thm gsumsnfd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum](s0 ‚àà { c1 } ‚Ü¶ c2))= c3)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Mnd)

  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, (s0 ‚àà { c1 } ‚Ü¶ c2), (s0 ‚àà { c1 } ‚Ü¶ c3), w0)

thm gsumzunsnd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, c3)), c4, c5)))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(ccntz, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cun(c2, csn(c8)), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wss(crn(c1), cfv(c7, crn(c1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c3, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c8, c9))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c8, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c8)), wceq(c3, c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, c3)), c4, c5))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  3eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, c3)), c4, c5), co(co(c0, cgsu, cres(c1, c2)), c4, co(c0, cgsu, cres(c1, csn(c8)))), co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, c3)), c4, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, csn(c8), c3))), w0)
  gsumzsplit(c0, c1, c2, c4, csn(c8), c6, cfv(c0g, c0), c7, cun(c2, csn(c8)), cfn, w0)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  fmptd(s0, c1, cun(c2, csn(c8)), c6, c3, w0)
  sylan2b(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c2, csn(c8))), wcel(c3, c6), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), csn(c8))))

thm gsumunsnfd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cun(c1, csn(c2)), c3)), co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c3)), c4, c5)))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c2, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(c3, c5))

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)

} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cun(c1, csn(c2)), c3)), co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c3)), c4, c5))), diffsc(s0, c0))

  gsummptfidmsplit(s0, c0, cun(c1, csn(c2)), c3, c1, c4, csn(c2), c6, w0)
  sylancl(w0, wcel(cun(c1, csn(c2)), cfn), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(csn(c2), cfn))
  snfi(c2)
  unfi(c1, csn(c2))
  sylan2b(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c1, csn(c2))), wcel(c3, c6), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), csn(c2))))
  elun(cv(s0), c1, csn(c2))
  jaodan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), csn(c2)), wcel(c3, c6))
  eqeltrd(c3, c6, c5, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), csn(c2))))

  elsni(cv(s0), c2)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), csn(c2)), wcel(c5, c6))

  snfi(c2)
  unfi(c1, { c2 })

  elun(s0, c1, { c2 })

  sylan2(w0, s0 ‚àà { c2 }, c3 = c5, s0 = c2)
  elsni(s0, c2)
  adantr(w0, s0 ‚àà { c2 }, c5 ‚àà c6)

  ‚ä£ c6 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(+ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà CMnd)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà Fin)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí c3 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c7)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ¬¨ c2 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = c2 ‚Üí c3 = c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c7)

  adantl(w0, s0 = c2, c3 = c5)
}

blocks.name: gsumunsn
blocks.content: Append an element to a finite group sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2014.) (Proof shortened by AV, 8-Mar-2019.)

thm gsumunsn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {

  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c3, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c2, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(c3, c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  gsumunsnd(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  adantl(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(c3, c5))

blocks.name: gsumdifsnd
blocks.content: Extract a summand from a finitely supported group sum. (Contributed by AV, 21-Apr-2019.) (Revised by AV, 28-Jul-2019.)

thm gsumdifsnd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {

  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c0))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c7))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))

} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c3)), c2)), c4, c5))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c3)), c2)), c4, c5), co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c3)), c2)), c4, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, csn(c3), c2))), w0)
  gsumsplit2(s0, c0, c1, c2, cdif(c1, csn(c3)), c4, csn(c3), c6, cfv(c0g, c0), c7, w0)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  syl5reqr(cin(cdif(c1, csn(c3)), csn(c3)), emptycls, cdif(csn(c3), csn(c3)), w0)
  difid(csn(c3))
  syl(w0, wceq(cdif(csn(c3), csn(c3)), cin(cdif(c1, csn(c3)), csn(c3))), wss(csn(c3), c1))

  difin2(csn(c3), c1, csn(c3))

  syl(w0, wceq(cun(cdif(c1, csn(c3)), csn(c3)), c1), wcel(c3, c1))

  gsumsnd(s0, c0, c3, c2, c5, c6, c1, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, ccmn))

thm gsumdifsnd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum](s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2))=((c0[gsum](s0 ‚àà(c1 \ { c3 })‚Ü¶ c2))[c4]c5))

  gsumsplit2(s0, c0, c1, c2, (c1 \ { c3 }), c4, { c3 }, c6, (0 ` c0), c7, w0)
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  syl5reqr(((c1 \ { c3 })‚ãÇ { c3 }), emptycls, ({ c3 } \ { c3 }), w0)

thm gsummptf1o(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, c3, c4))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c4)
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c7), wceq(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c8, c5))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, c8))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wcel(c7, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wreu(s1, c3, wceq(cv(s0), c7)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, c3, c4)), co(c0, cgsu, ccom(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cmpt(s1, c3, c7))), w0)
  gsumf1o(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cmpt(s1, c3, c7), c5, c6, c1, cfn, c3, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c1, c2, c5, w0)
  fsuppmptdm(s0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c6, c1, c2, c5, universe, w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  sseldd(c2, c5, c8, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wss(c8, c5))
  a1i(w0, wcel(c6, universe))
  fvexi(c6, c0g, c0)

  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, wreu(s1, c3, wceq(cv(s0), c7)))
  f1ompt(s1, s0, cmpt(s1, c3, c7), c3, c1, c7)
  eqid(cmpt(s1, c3, c7))
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, ccom(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cmpt(s1, c3, c7)), cmpt(s1, c3, c4), w0)
  eqtrd(ccom(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cmpt(s1, c3, c7)), cmpt(s1, c3, c4), cmpt(s1, c3, csb(s0, c7, c2)), w0)
  fmptcos(s1, s0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cmpt(s1, c3, c7), c3, c7, c2, c1, w0)
  ralrimiva(s1, c3, w0, wcel(c7, c1))
  eqidd(cmpt(s1, c3, c7), w0)
  eqidd(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s1, c3, csb(s0, c7, c2), c4, w0)
  csbiedf(s0, c7, c2, c4, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c3)))
  nfv(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c3)))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wnfc(s0, c4))
  adantl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wceq(cv(s0), c7), wceq(c2, c4))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, s1, c3, c7)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(cv(s1), c3))

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum](s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2))=(c0[gsum](s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ c4)))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c4)

  eqtrd((c0[gsum](s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)), (c0[gsum](s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ c4)), (c0[gsum]((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚àò(s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ c7))), w0)

  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, ((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚àò(s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ c7)), (s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ c4), w0)
  eqtrd(((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚àò(s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ c7)), (s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ c4), (s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶[c7 / s0]c2), w0)
  fmptcos(s1, s0, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2), (s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ c7), c3, c7, c2, c1, w0)

  csbiedf(s0, c7, c2, c4, c1, (w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3))

blocks.name: gsummptun
blocks.content: Group sum of a disjoint union, whereas sums are expressed as mappings. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Mar-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsummptun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cun(c1, c2), c3)), co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c3)), c4, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, c3)))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cun(c1, c2), cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c1, c2))), wcel(c3, c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  gsummptfidmsplit(s0, c0, cun(c1, c2), c3, c1, c4, c2, c5, w0)
  eqidd(cun(c1, c2), w0)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: gsummpt1n0
blocks.content: If only one summand in a finite group sum is not zero, the whole sum equals this summand. More general version of ~ gsummptif1n0 . (Contributed by AV, 11-Oct-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsummpt1n0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, c1), csb(s0, c2, c3), cfv(c1, c2), w0)

thm gsummpt1n0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum]c1)=[c2 / s0]c3)

  syl((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c5 \ { c2 })), if(s0 = c2, c3, c4)= c4, s0 ‚â† c2)
  adantl(w0, s0 ‚àà(c5 \ { c2 }), s0 ‚â† c2)

  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c5, if(s0 = c2, c3, c4), if(hs0 = c2,[hs0 / s0]c3, c4))

  nfv(s0, hs0 = c2)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c3)
  nfcv(s0, c4)
  ifbieq1d(c3, c4, [hs0 / s0]c3, s0 = hs0, s0 = c2, hs0 = c2)
  eqeq1(s0, hs0, c2)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c3)

  iftrue([hs0 / s0]c3, c4, hs0 = c2)
  csbeq1(s0, hs0, c2, c3)
  syl2anc(w0, [c2 / s0]c3 ‚àà(Base ` c0), c2 ‚àà c5, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c5, c3 ‚àà(Base ` c0)))

blocks.name: gsummptif1n0
blocks.content: If only one summand in a finite group sum is not zero, the whole sum equals this summand. (Contributed by AV, 17-Feb-2019.) (Proof shortened by AV, 11-Oct-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsummptif1n0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c4, cif(c2, c3, wceq(cv(s0), c6))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2, csb(s0, c6, c2), w0)
  gsummpt1n0(s0, c0, c1, c6, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  ralrimivw(s0, c4, w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  syl(w0, wceq(csb(s0, c6, c2), c2), wcel(c6, c4))
  csbconstg(s0, c6, c4, c2)
}

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum]c1)= c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c0)

thm gsummptfzcl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2nd)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
}

blocks.name: gsum2d2
blocks.content: Write a group sum over a two-dimensional region as a double sum. Note that ` C ( j ) ` is a function of ` j ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsum2d2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3)), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, c2, c3))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, c7))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c8, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c8, cv(s1))))), wceq(c3, c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c8)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3)), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, c2, c3)))), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(hs0))), co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1)))))), w0)
  gsum2d(hs0, hs1, c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), c1, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), c4, c5, universe, c6, w0)

  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, wcel(cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2), universe))
  sylancr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2), universe), wcel(csn(cv(s0)), universe), wcel(c2, c7))

  xpexg(csn(cv(s0)), universe, c2, c7)

  mpbir(wrel(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))), wral(s0, c1, wrel(cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))))
  rgenw(s0, c1, wrel(cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)))
  relxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)
  reliun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))
  ssrdv(hs2, cdm(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))), c1, w0)
  syl5bi(w0, wcel(cv(hs2), cdm(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)))), wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wex(hs3, wcel(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)))))
  eldm2(hs3, cv(hs2), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)))
  exlimdv(hs3, w0, wcel(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))
  syl5bi(w0, wcel(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))), wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))))
  eliunxp(s0, s1, cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), c1, c2)
  exlimdvv(s0, s1, w0, wa(wceq(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))
  ex(w0, wa(wceq(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))
  eqeltrd(cv(hs2), c1, cv(s0), wa(w0, wa(wceq(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))))
  ad2antrl(w0, wceq(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cv(hs2), cv(s0)))

  sylib(w0, wf(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), c4), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c2, wcel(c3, c4))))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c1, c2, w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  fmpt2x(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3, c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3))
  gsum2d2lem(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3, c5, c4, c0, c6, c7, c8, w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(hs0))), co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1))))), cmpt(s0, c1, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, c2, c3))), w0)
  syl5eq(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(hs0))), co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1))))), cmpt(s0, c1, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, c2, c3))), cmpt(s0, c1, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1))))), w0)
  cbvmpt(hs0, s0, c1, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(hs0))), co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1)))), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1)))))
  nfov(s0, c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(hs0))), co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1))))
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(s0, cgsu)
  nfmpt(s0, hs1, cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(hs0))), co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1)))
  nfima(s0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(hs0)))
  nfiu1(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))
  nfcv(s0, csn(cv(hs0)))
  nfov(s0, cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfmpt21(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3)
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs1))
  nfcv(hs0, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1)))))
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(hs0))), co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1))), cmpt(hs1, cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  mpteq12dv(hs1, cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(hs0))), co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1)), cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  imaeq2d(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  sneq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))

blocks.name: gsumcom2
blocks.content: Two-dimensional commutation of a group sum. Note that while ` A ` and ` D ` are constants w.r.t. ` j , k ` , ` C ( j ) ` and ` E ( k ) ` are not. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Dec-2014.)

blocks.name: gsumxp
blocks.content: Write a group sum over a cartesian product as a double sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Dec-2014.) (Revised by AV, 9-Jun-2019.)

thm gsumxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, c3, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, cxp(c2, c3), c4))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cfsupp, c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, c3, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))))))), diffsc(s0, c6))
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, c3, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))))), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, cima(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))))), w0)
  gsum2d(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, cxp(c2, c3), c4, c5, universe, c6, w0)
  xpexd(c2, c3, c6, c7, w0)
  a1i(w0, wrel(cxp(c2, c3)))
  relxp(c2, c3)
  a1i(w0, wss(cdm(cxp(c2, c3)), c2))
  dmxpss(c2, c3)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, cima(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))), cmpt(s0, c2, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, c3, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c2, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, cima(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, c3, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, cima(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), cmpt(s1, c3, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  mpteq1d(s1, cima(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  syl5eq(cima(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0))), c3, crn(cres(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  df-ima(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0)))
  syl6eq(crn(cres(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0)))), c3, crn(cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  rneqd(cres(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0))), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  syl5eq(cres(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0))), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3), cxp(cin(c2, csn(cv(s0))), cin(c3, universe)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  eqtri(cres(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0))), cxp(cin(c2, csn(cv(s0))), cin(c3, universe)), cin(cxp(c2, c3), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), universe)))
  df-res(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0)))
  inxp(c2, c3, csn(cv(s0)), universe)
  xpeq12d(cin(c2, csn(cv(s0))), cin(c3, universe), csn(cv(s0)), c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  sylib(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(cin(c2, csn(cv(s0))), csn(cv(s0))), wss(csn(cv(s0)), c2))
  snssd(cv(s0), c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  sseqin2(csn(cv(s0)), c2)
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(cin(c3, universe), c3))
  inv1(c3)
  ax-mp(wceq(crn(cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3)), c3), wne(csn(cv(s0)), emptycls))
  snnz(cv(s0))
  vex(s0)
  rnxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c2, c3)
  diff.cima.s(s1, cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0)))
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c2, c3)
  diff.csn.s(s1, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: gsumcom
blocks.content: Commute the arguments of a double sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumcom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3)), co(c0, cgsu, cmpo(s1, s0, c2, c1, c3))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c7))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c8, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c8, cv(s1))))), wceq(c3, c5))

  -| diffsc(s0, c4)

  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c8)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  gsumcom2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c2, c1, c4, c5, c6, c7, c8, c7, w0)

blocks.name: pwsgsum
blocks.content: Finite commutative sums in a power structure are taken componentwise. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jul-2015.) (Revised by AV, 9-Jun-2019.)

thm pwsgsum(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, cmpt(s1, c2, c3))), cmpt(s1, c2, co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c3)))))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c4, cpws, c2))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, ccmn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c1, cmpt(s1, c2, c3)), cfsupp, c6))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)

  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)

  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, cmpt(s1, c2, c3))), cmpt(s1, c2, co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c3))))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, cmpt(s1, c2, c3))), cmpt(s1, c2, co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c3))))), diffsc(s0, c5))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, cmpt(s1, c2, c3))), cmpt(s1, c2, co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c3))))), diffsc(s0, c6))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, cmpt(s1, c2, c3))), cmpt(s1, c2, co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c3))))), diffsc(s1, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, cmpt(s1, c2, c3))), cmpt(s1, c2, co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c3))))), diffsc(s1, c5))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, cmpt(s1, c2, c3))), cmpt(s1, c2, co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c3))))), diffsc(s1, c6))
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, cmpt(s1, c2, c3))), cmpt(s1, c2, co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c3))), co(co(cfv(csca, c4), cprds, cxp(c2, csn(c4))), cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, cmpt(s1, c2, c3))), w0)
  oveq1d(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, cmpt(s1, c2, c3)), co(cfv(csca, c4), cprds, cxp(c2, csn(c4))), w0)
  prdsgsum(s0, s1, co(cfv(csca, c4), cprds, cxp(c2, csn(c4))), c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(csca, c4), c5, cfv(c0g, co(cfv(csca, c4), cprds, cxp(c2, csn(c4)))), c7, c8, universe, w0)
  oveq2i(cfv(csca, c4), cprds, cxp(c2, csn(c4)), cmpt(s1, c2, c4))
  fconstmpt(s1, c2, c4)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, co(cfv(csca, c4), cprds, cxp(c2, csn(c4)))))
  fvexd(csca, c4, w0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(c4, ccmn))
